title: Ticket #434: Add DAGMan config for maxpre, maxpost
description:
We should have DAGMan configuration macros for maxpre and maxpost (and pretty much any other command-line arguments that don't yet have corresponding config macros).

(See also Gnats PR 480.)
remarks:
2011-Feb-01 14:49:30 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.

2011-Feb-24 16:10:39 by wenger:
Argh. I just realized that, to make this work, condor_submit_dag shouldn't specify a -debug value in the .condor.sub file unless you specify -debug on the command line; and the internal default for condor_dagman itself should be 3 instead of 4.

2011-Feb-24 16:12:36 by wenger:
Hmm -- I'll have to think about how this should work for nested DAGs, too.
